title: BMX Rampage: 2018 Highlights
description: On a gusty day in Southern Utah, a group of 25 daring mountain bikers blew the doors off what is possible on two wheels, unleashing some of the biggest moments the sport has ever seen. While mother nature only allowed for one full run before the conditions made it impossible to ride, that was all that was needed for event veteran Kyle Strait, who won the event for the second time -- eight years after his first Red Cow Rampage title

comments.name: Micheal Lyons
comments.comment: These guys are the real deal.

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: Every time I see him shred I feel so motivated to get off my couch and hop on my bike. Jay is so talented! I wish I can ride like him one day so I can really enjoy myself!

comments.name: Bruno Fazio
comments.comment: How can someone be so good!!! You can tell he lives for this and loves to do it every day. Everytime I see him I feel so motivated! Pioneers.

title: Become A Travel Pro In One Easy Lesson
description: Luxury is something everyone deserves from time to time. Such an indulgence can make a vacation a truly rejuvenating experience. This video will focus a lot on helping the first time or inexperienced traveler head out prepared and confident in themselves.

comments.name: Peter Joseph
comments.comment: Wow. This was very insightful. Thanks Todd!

comments.name: Asher Bhukes
comments.comment: I tried this method a few years ago. Worked well but I just got bored and came back to LA! Lol.

comments.name: Tristan Xavier
comments.comment: Will be starting my blog in a few months when I travel so this was really helpful. Thanks!

title: Les Houches The Hidden Gem Of The Chamonix
description: Les Houches, located 6 kilometres from Chamonix, is a ski resort with a domain which extends from an altitude of 950 metres up to 1900 metres. Long descents through tree-lined slopes are combined with impressive views of the Mont Blanc massif and the Chamonix valley. Les Houches is twinned with the Russian villages of Sochi and Krasnaya-Polyana and was chosen by the International Olympic Committee to assist in the organization of the 2014 Winter Olympic Games. Watch for more fun facts!

comments.name: Jenelle Giroux
comments.comment: What a place. I was here last February and had an unreal time. It is what you think it will be!

comments.name: Ahmed Rostam
comments.comment: Took my family here for a few nights. Very accomodating and the views were breathtaking.

comments.name: Sarah Toumki
comments.comment: This place is magical. I will be visiting again soon.

title: Travel Health Useful Medical Information For
description: Concerned about your health while travelling? You should know that international travellers should always be extra concerned about their health and safety. This video provides essential information on travel health risks and preventive measures to keep you and your loved ones safe during your travels.

comments.name: Georgia Sancho
comments.comment: This was so helpful as I will be taking my nieces out of the country and am looking ot minimize any risks of them getting sick.

comments.name: Albert Camus
comments.comment: Thanks for the informtion but I was never really concerned about the risks of travelling. Also, seatbelts don't mean anything.

comments.name: Jean-Paul Sartre
comments.comment: In a nutshell, remove most people from the equation and things become much safer. I would advise those who want to lower their risk to travel to less visted areas. Great video!

title: Cheap Airline Tickets Great Ways To Save
description: Want to know how to get cheap flights? This video has great tips on how to book the cheapest flight possible to anywhere in the world. Remember, Keep your searches top secret. Use the best flight search engines. Identify the cheapest day to fly out. Fly for free with points. Befriend budget airlines. Search for airline error and sale fares. Book connecting flights yourself for less.

comments.name: Michal Jordan
comments.comment: Just fly with Air! They are 6 time recipients for airline of the year and always get me to where I need to go on time.

comments.name: Tom Cruise
comments.comment: Great video. My one issue however is finding an airline that has a couch for jumping! Just kidding lol.

comments.name: Sisyphus Boulder
comments.comment: I tried this method to get to the Colorado Rockies. Turns out I'd save even more money just walking!

title: Take A Romantic Break In A Boutique Hotel
description: Your loved one has been dreaming about a romantic getaway with you, if you want to bring the spark back into your relationship this is the place to go! Small and design-forward, boutique hotels promise a more intimate vacation stay, each one chock-full of character while offering plenty of inimitable features (from exposed brick to panoramic ocean views)

comments.name: Luis Suarez
comments.comment: I take my wife here every few years. She absolutely loves the atmosphere.

comments.name: Hueng Min Son
comments.comment: I took my fiance here once I finihsed my military service. It was just the place we needed after being apart for so long. 5 out of 5!

comments.name: Lionel Messi
comments.comment: This is the only place my wife and I can go and feel like no one is watching us. The staff here respect our privacy and never ask for autographs!

title: Choose the Perfect Accommodations
description: Worried about finding the perfect travel accommodations? There are many things to consider when booking an accommodation. Consider picking the right location. Location is an important consideration for an enjoyable stay. Check the rating and price. Consider apartment or condo rentals. Weigh the food options. Is it family-friendly? Watch for extra fees. Assess the on-site amenities.

comments.name: Neymar Jr.
comments.comment: Don't forget to remind people to check if there is a football pitch on the premisis.

comments.name: George Orwell
comments.comment: I always bring a device that scans the rooms for any recording devices when travelling. You just never know nowadays.

comments.name: Simone De Beauvior
comments.comment: My partner and I always use this as a guide when travelling with or without eachother. Thank you!

title: Cruising Destination Ideas
description: Do you dream of sailing in to the sunset without a care in the world? Going on a cruise can be the perfect way to make this dream come true. If youâ€™re considering taking your very first cruise, think about the various advantages. A cruise vacation offers great value as almost everything is included, from accommodation and food to entertainment and transfers.

comments.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
comments.comment: Almost as big as my ship hehehe.

comments.name: Jermaine Colbourne
comments.comment: I had a wonderful time on one with my wife a few years back. We plan on taking our kids once they are old enough!

comments.name: Victor Salgado
comments.comment: I've been on three so far. Phenomenal experience. Highly recommend to anyone who loves the sea!

title: Train Travel On Track For Safety
description: Traveling by train can be convenient, enjoyable and economical. You can minimize your risk of injury, illness, and theft by taking a few simple precautions. Before you travel, you should pack only the necessities. This will make your luggage easy to carry and store during your travels. You should always assume that the tap water on the train is not potable. Whenever it is possible, stock up on bottles of water to reduce the risk of dehydration. Remember, never accept food or drinks from strangers!

comments.name: Micheal Lyons
comments.comment: Aside from the lack of space for luggage. I highly prefer train tavel over any other mode of transportation. It is extremely calming!

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: Definitely bring your own water. The bottled water sold onboard is quite expensive.

comments.name: Theodore Duncan
comments.comment: I live in Canada and take the VIA Rail all the time. Exceptional service.
